description: Contains nested panel information where each line represents one level of nesting.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NESTED_PANEL_ID
columns.description: Stores a list of OSQ IDs representing the nested panels from which an order was placed.

columns.name: NESTED_PANEL_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Stores a list of grouped orders (OSQ) contact dates (DATs) corresponding to the nested (group within group) OSQ IDs.

columns.name: NESTED_PANEL_UNIQ_KEY
columns.description: Stores a list of "panel info"s corresponding to the OSQ IDs above, which uniquely identify identical nested OSQs placed in the same ordering session.

columns.name: NESTED_GROUP_ID
columns.description: For orders from clinical pathways (a method of placing many orders that are meant to take place over a period of time all at once), stores a list of TRG IDs representing the groups of orders which contain other groups of orders from which the order originated.

columns.name: NESTED_GROUP_CSN
columns.description: Stores a list of Patient Order Groups and Treatment Days (TRG) Contact Serial Numbers (CSN) associated with the above TRG IDs.
